turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to place a pizza order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds yummy. Where do you want to place an order from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I know just the place. What did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get two large pizzas. On the first one, I would like it to be spinach and chicken. And on the second pizza, I would like it to be a meat lovers pizza. I would also like both of those to have a gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it. To confirm, you want 2 large pizzas, 1 with spinach and chicken, and 1 meat lovers. Both with gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $24.99 is the total. Should I place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, I've placed the order. It'll be ready for pick up in 45 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can do for you?

items.name: You got it. To confirm, you wan
